entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
